title: Usagi-chan Doshikori Moushiagemasu
description:
Trying to relax, Mitsuomi goes to a man-boob pub, where he meets Megu-kun – who has big pecs, a big ass, and an erotic body – and falls in love at first sight.

If you rub his sunken-in nipples, Megu-kun gets hard!? 

He’s not good at the real thing, but if it’s comfort sex…it’s okay?

A fluffy and sexy story!!
